statements: SELECT * FROM network_usage_data WHERE bytes_sent > 1000;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM network_usage_data WHERE bytes_sent > 500 AND bytes_received <= 2000;
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data WHERE port IN (80, 443) ORDER BY bytes_sent DESC;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM network_usage_data WHERE bytes_sent = bytes_received;
SELECT SUM(bytes_sent) AS total_bytes_sent, AVG(bytes_received) AS average_bytes_received FROM network_usage_data;
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data WHERE bytes_sent > 1000 ORDER BY source_ip DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, SUM(bytes_received) AS total_bytes_received FROM network_usage_data GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_bytes_received > 5000 ORDER BY total_bytes_received DESC;
SELECT destination_ip, AVG(bytes_sent) AS avg_bytes_sent FROM network_usage_data WHERE port = 80 GROUP BY destination_ip ORDER BY avg_bytes_sent ASC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_sent + bytes_received AS total_bytes_transferred FROM network_usage_data WHERE port BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY total_bytes_transferred DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, MAX(bytes_sent) AS max_bytes_sent FROM network_usage_data GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip ORDER BY max_bytes_sent DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, user_id, date, data_usage FROM network_usage_data
SELECT user_id, data_usage, date, id FROM network_usage_data
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data
SELECT user_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_usage FROM network_usage_data GROUP BY user_id
SELECT plan_id, network_id, capacity FROM capacity_planning
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_usage FROM network_usage_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_usage DESC
SELECT network_id, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM capacity_planning GROUP BY network_id ORDER BY total_capacity DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_usage FROM network_usage_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_usage > 1000
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY data_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, bytes_transferred FROM network_usage_data WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT pattern_name, bytes_threshold, alert_level FROM network_patterns WHERE bytes_threshold > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, bytes_transferred FROM network_usage_data WHERE network_id = 5 AND bytes_transferred > 1000;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT pattern_name, bytes_threshold, alert_level FROM network_patterns ORDER BY bytes_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_department FROM network_users WHERE user_department = 'IT';
SELECT device_id, timestamp, traffic_in, traffic_out FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_type, report_date, report_data FROM network_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT device_name, traffic_in, traffic_out FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id;
SELECT user_name, user_department, user_role FROM network_users WHERE user_department = 'IT' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data;
SELECT device_id, bytes_sent, bytes_received FROM network_usage_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, data_usage FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, region FROM location_mapping WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT * FROM network_usage_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, bytes_sent, bytes_received FROM network_usage_data WHERE bytes_sent > 100000 AND bytes_received > 50000;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, data_usage FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date < '2022-01-01' AND data_usage >= 500;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_name, city FROM network_devices JOIN location_mapping ON network_devices.location_id = location_mapping.location_id WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT device_id, last_seen FROM device_mapping ORDER BY last_seen ASC;
